---
category: news
title: "AWS cryptojacking campaign abuses less-used services to hide"
excerpt: "The attackers then start abusing the newly created roles in various services, beginning with AWS CodeCommit where they create a private Git repository that hosts the code they need for the next steps of their attack. This allows them to not leave the AWS ecosystem after the initial compromise, lowering the chances of outbound traffic alerts."
